channel.title: 508 Magic Help!
channel.description: In my 508 Server, Since the start i am getting a glitch where you attack attack people out of wild! i want to fix this glitch! also i need help stop more than 5 accounts from logging in from same ip address to block spammers!

item.title: 508 Magic Help!
item.dc:creator: @kpop kpop
item.description:
@kpop wrote:

if you mean where you can attack people outside the coordinates of the wild then that means something is wrong with your canattackplayer segment of your player.java

either that or the areas u can attack players is defined as a wilderness zone in your engine.java try checking those and if u have more problems tell me or pm me

Read full topic
